projectTitle: Graphical user interface for robot operation
projectDescription: SumatoSoft developed a graphic user interface (GUI) that helps to communicate with the robot Alfred, an automated robotic arm.

projectTitle: Web networking platform for online marketers
projectDescription: A web platform for finding online marketing partners with multiple monetization ways, scalable architecture, advanced search & social network.
A blockchain-based web and mobile platform that allows companies and individuals to buy and sell big data sets securely through a private digital identity and pay with Bitcoin.
